attributes.review: I downloaded this app show my privileged appreciation ✨ for my lovely 💖president 🍊 but then I was greeted by a virus 🦠givin by the APP‼️ The virus traveled traveled through my phone to my finger tips 🖕 and now I have NO FINGERS 😰 If you are wondering how I am writing my review, well it’s simple, I’m using my gigantic GLIZZY 🌭 All I can say is that I am very disappointed in our handsome president 👨🏼This app might even have givin lung cancer 🤮
attributes.title: My fingers DISAPPEARED from using this app‼️

attributes.review: I think this app put a virus on my phone. Whenever I open my phone ads pop up and when I open the open the screen just turns black. I tried to delete it but my phone keeps on crashing. Worst app ever. I wish I never downloaded it. Now I probably have to get a new phone. Please take this app off the App Store I don’t want anyone else to have to buy a new phone
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review:
I can’t do anything the app just crashes and it keep showing me pictures of this ugly orange man i don’t know his name but I would like to not see him anymore. There is an extremely disturbing logo on the app that I find very offensive please listen to this review and do not waste your time getting this app.
                                                
                                                  ~ sincerely, Genz99
attributes.title: No words

attributes.review: This app made me so scared. This app made a bunch of sharks come to my house and eat all of my limbs and now I have no limbs. My life will be forever changed and affected. Now the sharks won’t leave and are taunting me. I don’t know what to do. This app is awful and only brings bad vibes. I’m warning you know please don’t download this app unless you want sharks to eat all of your limbs cause it will happen!
attributes.title: I’m terrified 🍊

attributes.review: I’m ShOoK to say dis app is disgusting✋🏼😑I cant even believe wat happen it all happen so fast😢😔I was just being a lovely amazing awesome beautiful person and downloading the app to “support” our “LOVELY” “AMAZING “ orange Cheeto puff president when suddenly I opened the app and OMG IT WAS HORRIBLE MAN😱😩😢😖 THE CHEETO PUFF MAN POP UP ON MY SCREEN ‼️‼️‼️🚨😱😱😱😩😩😢🤢 I have never been so scared in my life I WAS terrified my eyes got VIOLATED I feel disgusted I feel horrible I can’t believe dis has happen TO ME I am discussed ✋🏼🤢🥺😢
attributes.title: 🚨‼️DIS IS A DISGUSTING ‼️🚨

attributes.review: this app is absolutely horrible!!! the big orange texted me on here and said that if i didnt vote for him he would send his racists after me!! so i left him on read and the next thing i knew the racists minions AND trump were at my door!!! so i pulled out my phone and deleted this app, and trump gave me a hug and his racists combed my hair!! but i kicked them all in the balls😼 dont get this app!!!! its so bad!!! i still get the nightmares 😔
attributes.title: dont download!!!!

attributes.review: Yeah so I downloaded this app and it kept glitching and doing weird things and it wouldn’t load and then my mom came over to see what I was frustrated about and she saw the app and literally no joke threw up. Like seriously she has a sensitive stomach and just like the content and the fact that it was Trump and glitching was too much ig😔🖐 do NOT recommend downloading
attributes.title: Very very very very very very bad

attributes.review: when I opened the app there was a picture of mr. fat hot Cheeto🍊🍊 but not only that, there were cockroaches coming out of the screen and spiders all over my house. Due to this unfortunate occurrence I had to immediately move houses and my poor goldfish couldn’t walk anymore😤😪I had to pay tons and thousands of dalla dalla bills just to get mr. goldyfish to walk again💸. 10/10 ⚠️WOULD NOT⚠️recommend!!!
attributes.title: HAD TO SWITCH HOUSES😡👹

attributes.review: It took weeks to download and I was just trying to support the orange god but when the app finally downloaded I opened it up and my phone glitches out then the orange gods voice started playing on my phone all he was saying is give me 5 stars 5 stars for trump so I powered off my phone and deleted the app and I still feel like The orange god is stalking my phone.
attributes.title: This is the worst app ever🤦🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: This app had so many glitches my phone still glitches sometimes at times hopefully they install some softwares to upgrade the glitches. It’s like if someone is playing jumanji glitches by glitches it’s just soooo horrible. i don’t think they’ll be able to fix that many glitches maybe the best solution is to bring the app down.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE
